column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is always on the agenda if I'm in Chicago. I stayed at the Merch Mart Holiday inn this last trip
column2: which put me right nearby. Great drinks
column4: great ambience. They wouldn't take our last minute (the day before) reservation
column5: so we ate at Coco Pazzo
column7: but I was a little disappointed we weren't here. Skip lunch
column8: save room in your belly and enjoy the ride.
